com.lss233.phoenix.entity

Interface Equipable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Carrier, Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Player

    public interface Equipable
extends Identifiable, Carrier
    Represents an entity that has an EquipmentInventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void clearEquipments()
      Clears the entity of all armor and held items
      boolean equip(EquipmentType type, ItemStack itemStack)
      Sets the item currently equipped by the entity in the specified slot, if the entity has such a slot.

      Gets the boots currently being worn by this entity.

      Gets the chest plate currently being worn by this entity.

      Gets the helmet currently being worn by this entity.

    • Method Detail

      • equip

        boolean equip(EquipmentType type,
              @Nullable
              ItemStack itemStack)
        Sets the item currently equipped by the entity in the specified slot, if the entity has such a slot.

        Supplying null to itemStack will remove currently equipped item.

        Parameters:
        type - The type of equipment slot to set
        itemStack - The equipment to set or null to remove any equipped item
        Returns:
        True if the item was successfully equipped

      • getEquipped

        Optional<ItemStack> getEquipped(EquipmentType type)
        Gets the item currently equipped by this entity in the specified slot.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of equipment slot
        Returns:
        The item in the equipped slot
